  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>

    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:melt.cup.cam.ac.uk:cahi1:data_110894</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_110894</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Universe two-sphere model</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Universum Zweibereich Modell</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Modèle de deux-sphère d'univers</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Modelo da dois-esfera do universo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Modello della due-sfera dell'universo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μοντέλο δύο-σφαιρών κόσμου</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Modelo de la dos-esfera del universo</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This diagram illustrates the two-sphere model of the Universe that shows the annual ecliptic path of the Sun in the celestial sphere.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">celestial sphere</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Earth</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">ecliptic path</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">rotation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">sun</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">two-sphere model</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Universe</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses Diagramm veranschaulicht das Zweibereich 
Modell des Universums, das den jährlichen Sonnenbahnpfad der Sonne im
himmlischen Bereich zeigt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce diagramme illustre le modèle de deux-sphère 
de l'univers qui montre la voie d'accès annuelle d'écliptique du 
soleil dans la sphère céleste.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este diagrama ilustra o modelo da dois-esfera do 
universo que mostra o trajeto anual da eclíptica do sol na esfera 
celestial.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo schema illustra il modello della due-sfera
dell'universo che mostra il percorso annuale di ecliptic del sole 
nella sfera celeste.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το διάγραμμα επεξηγεί το μοντέλο δύο-σφαιρών 
του κόσμου που εμφανίζει ετήσιο εκλειπτικό μονοπάτι του ήλιου 
στην ουράνια σφαίρα.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este diagrama ilustra el modelo de la dos-esfera 
del universo que muestra el camino anual de la eclíptica del sol en 
la esfera celestial.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">himmlischer Bereich</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Masse</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
